Package com.project.capstone.sales

Interface ItemService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemServiceAccess
public interface ItemService
The Service interface for the Item Entity.

  • Method Details

    • getItem

      Optional<Item> getItem(Integer id)
      Get an item from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id you would like to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The item.

    • createItem

      Item createItem(Item item)
      Creates a new item and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The item you want to create.
      Returns:
      The item created.

    • fetchItemList

      List<Item> fetchItemList()
      Fetches all the items.
      Returns:
      A list of all the items.

    • updateItem

      Item updateItem(Item item, Integer id) throws ItemNotFoundException
      Updates a current item in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The item you would like to edit.
      id - The id of the item.
      Returns:
      The newly updated item.
      Throws:
      ItemNotFoundException - Thrown if the item is not found.

    • deleteItemById

      void deleteItemById(Integer id)
      Delete an item in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the item you would like to create.
